Her guards did same and , looking for =

 Subject: Re: Towards the Meeting:


  A squad of guards in ceremonial deco=
rations came out. The last two
  carried a bulky electronic thing that took=
 much place.

  Squad chief: Welcome, Milady, to Relay City. Before I can l=
et you go
  forward, I would like to make you pass the security test. Pleas=
e
  remain still.

  The last two guards advanced with the thing and deploy=
ed it. It was an
  elaborate scanner that detected certain weapons, but no =
traces of
  dangerous devices and programs.

  Squad Chief: I must now ask =
you and your guards to leave all your
  weapons in this case. It's reserved=
 for you only so no one else will
  open it.
